pr_title: Attachment ingest processor: add resource_name field

timeline.message: Add filename for Tika to better recognize the txt file
add test for adding file_name field in ingest-attachment

timeline.bodyText: I think this should call readOptionalStringProperty so that any existing fields named file_name that are not intended for Tika will not be inadvertently used.
timeline.author: danhermann

replies.bodyText: Also, is there any particular reason why you chose file_name as the property name when it's called resourceName on the Tika side? Unless there's a good reason for file_name, it's probably best to stick with resource_name since that's what Tika calls the property.
replies.author: danhermann

timeline.bodyText: When readOptionalStringProperty is used as I suggested in another comment, this should retrieve the field value only when fileName != null.
timeline.author: danhermann

timeline.message: [Plugin Attachment] update variable name to meet tika's name

timeline.author: danhermann
danhermann
danhermann

replies.bodyText: but it's will make the test fail
replies.author: yangyaofei

replies.bodyText: Not if resource_name is not specified for this test.
replies.author: danhermann

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove this line so these tests remain unchanged as well.
timeline.author: danhermann

replies.bodyText: but, the new field "resource_name"  should be added here, if not , the "resource_name" will meaningless
replies.author: yangyaofei

replies.bodyText: Please see my other comment here: #64389 (comment) -- I would like to isolate the testing for resource_name to a new test method and keep the existing tests to verify that the processor's behavior doesn't change if resource_name is unspecified. Let me know if you have any questions about that.
replies.author: danhermann

timeline.author: danhermann
danhermann
danhermann
danhermann

timeline.bodyText: Could you add an override for the parseDocument method that adds a boolean includeResourceName parameter and only add resource_name if that parameter is true?
timeline.author: danhermann

replies.bodyText: That what I'm going to do, please stay here, I don't want to wait for another week to continue this conversation. I will finish this this night
replies.author: yangyaofei

timeline.author: danhermann
danhermann

timeline.bodyText: Can you add these tests to a new test method named something like testIndexedCharsWithResourceName that calls your new overloaded parseDocument method with includeResourceName as true so that it separately tests your new functionality without changing the existing tests?
timeline.author: danhermann

replies.bodyText: ok, I get it ,wait for a moment
replies.author: yangyaofei
